channel.title: Authors on Fibro Hell
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Fibro Hell

item.title: Bruno
item.description: I’m passionate about free software, open-source and open hardware. I maintain a binary repository, userrepository, for Arch and Arch-based Linux distributions, and I’m a volunteer with Fosshost. Also, as you can see by the avatar I chose, I’m a big The Simpsons fan.
